extensionName.description: The name of the Thunderbird MailExtension

extensionDescription.message: Makes it easier to unsubscribe from mailing lists.
extensionDescription.description: The description of the Thunderbird MailExtension

emailText.message: Would you like to unsubscribe from this mailing list?
emailText.description: Text asking the user if they want to unsubscribe

deleteButton.description: Label for the delete button with a dropdown indicator

deleteOneButton.description: Label for the button to delete only the current email

deleteAllButton.description: Label for the button to delete all emails from a specific sender, where $1 is the sender's email

statusTextDeleting.description: Status text while email(s) are being deleted

statusTextDeleteSuccess.description: Status text for successful email deletion

statusTextDeleteError.description: Status text when email deletion fails

detailsTextPost.message: When you click "Unsubscribe", a post request will be sent to the following URL:

detailsTextEmail.message: When you click "Unsubscribe", an email will be drafted to the following address:

detailsTextWeb.message: When you click "Unsubscribe", a browser window will open and will visit the following URL:
